fields.name: Rent:
fields.value:
- Base: $35
- 1 Igloo: $135
- 2 Igloo: $285
- 3 Igloo: $670
- 4 Igloo: $890
- 5+ Igloo: $1200

Igloos cost $150 per Igloo.

Igloos replace houses and hotels
There is no limit to the number of igloos this space can hold.

When you **Stop In**, gain skip immunity for 3 turns.

**On Pass**, every player besides the owner within X number of spaces has their next skippable turn skipped. X being the number of Igloos on this property. This does not include yourself.
